text: قالوا۟ ربنا من قدم لنا هذا فزده عذابا ضعفا فى النار

translations.translation: They will say, 'Our Lord, give him who brought this on us double the punishment in the Fire!'
They will say: "O Lord, give him who has brought this upon us two times more the torment of Hell;"
They will say: “Our Lord, give twofold punishment in the Fire to him who has led us to this.”
They will continue saying, "Lord, double the torment of fire for those who led us into this.
They say, “Our Lord! Whoever has brought this calamity upon us – double the punishment of the fire for him!”
They will say: "Our Lord! Whoever brought this upon us, add to him a double torment in the Fire!"
They shall say: Our Lord! whoever prepared it first for us, add Thou to him a double chastisement in the fire.
They say, 'Our Lord, whoso forwarded this for us, give him a double chastisement in the Fire!'
They say: Our Lord! Whoever did prepare this for us, oh, give him double portion of the Fire!
adding, "Our Lord, give double punishment to those who brought this upon us."
They Will say: our Lord! whosever hath brought this upon us, - Unto him increase doubly the torment of the Fire.
They will say, ‘Our Lord! Whoever has prepared this for us, double his punishment in the Fire!’
They will say: "Our Lord! whoever brought this upon us,- Add to him a double Penalty in the Fire!"
They will say: "Our Lord! Whoever brought this upon us, add to him a double torment in the Fire!"
They will say: 'Our Lord, give those who brought this upon us double the punishment of the Fire'
They will say, “Our Lord, whoever brought this upon us, give him double torment in the Fire.”
They will say, "Our Lord, whoever brought this upon us - increase for him double punishment in the Fire."
[38:61] They, also, say, ‘Our Lord, whoever prepared this for us, give him double his chastisement, that is, [give him in addition] the like of his chastisement, for his disbelief, in the Fire!’

(They say) the first to enter the Fire and the last say: (Our Lord!) our Lord! (Whoever did prepare) whoever prescribed (this) religion; meaning here Satan and all the leaders of error (for us), oh, give him double portion of the Fire) double than what we have!

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
حيث { قَالُواْ رَبَّنَا } يا من ربانا على فطرة التوحيد
 وأشركناك بشؤم هؤلاء المشركين المضلين
 ونرجو من عدلك { مَن قَدَّمَ لَنَا هَـٰذَا } ودلنا عليه بتغريره { فَزِدْهُ عَذَاباً ضِعْفاً } أي: ضعف عذابنا { فِي ٱلنَّارِ } [ص: 61] إذ نحن ضالون
 وهم ضالون مضلون

{ وَقَالُواْ } أي: الرؤساء القادة بعدما توغلوا في ألوان العذاب على سبيل التحسر والتقريع على أنفسهم: { مَا لَنَا } أي: أي: شيؤء عرض لنا

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
متوجهين إلى الله: { ربَّنا مَن قدَّم لنا هذا فزِدْهُ عذاباً ضعفاً } أي: مضاعفاً

{ في النار } أو: ذا ضعف
 ومثله قوله:
[الأعراف: 38]
 وهو أن يزيد على عذابه مثله
